
31						      8     4    0
0000 0000  0000 0000  0000 0000  0000 0000
bytes by place                        21
2^3 = 8
2^4 = 16
2^5 = 32

f = 1111
e = 1110
d = 1101
c = 1100

1800
0001 1000 0000 0000


masks

mscratch	1111 1110 1111 1110 0111 1111 0111 1111
x1			1000 0000 1000 0000 0100 0000 0100 0000

expected
